channel.title: [SELLER API] Get expiry of a user
channel.description: Hi, it's possible to get the expiry of a user with the seller api ? I saw that it was possible with the **fetchallkeys** but it is not update everytime, we need to create a key manually on the site to update the api.

item.title: [SELLER API] Get expiry of a user
item.dc:creator: vorace32
item.description:
" self.user_data.expires " don’t use the seller api, I need the seller api for a discord bot, not a exe

Read full topic
